I can't reproduce this.  What was being displayed in the table?  How did you invoke the refresh action?   From the stack it looks like you were invoking the select columns action.
I haven't seen any response to this.  Is this something that happens on linux client only?
I'm not able to run eclipse on a linux client anymore so I can't verify whether this is still a problem or not.  Martin, can you check if this still happens?
